meanings.definition: Ankylosauruses: plural noun, a group of herbivorous dinosaurs characterized by their heavily armored bodies and clubbed tails.
meanings.sent1: The ankylosauruses roamed the prehistoric lands, protected by their tough armor.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study ankylosauruses to learn more about these ancient creatures.
meanings.sent3: The ankylosauruses decided to have a tail clubbing competition for fun.
meanings.sent4: In a world full of dangers, the ankylosauruses' armored bodies were their shield.
meanings.sent5: Children love reading about ankylosauruses in books because of their unique features.
